original_text: asking as a favor against Paul that he summon him to Jerusalem—because they were planning an ambush to kill him on the way.
korean_text: 베스도의 호의로 바울을 예루살렘으로 옮기기를 청하니 이는 길에 매복하였다가 그를 죽이고자 함이더라

sentences.original_text: asking as a favor against Paul
that he summon him to Jerusalem
because they were planning an ambush
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 매복 계획을 세웠기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: to kill him on the way
